## registry variable

Registry SDK client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registry: (client: APIClient) => {
    images: {
        getAll(project?: Id<'project'>): Promise<string[]>;
        getManifest(image: string): Promise<{
            digest: {
                digest: string;
                size: number;
                uploaded: string;
            };
            tag: string | null;
        }[]>;
        delete(image: string): Promise<void>;
    };
}
```
